install.name: Yj Newsflash 5
install.author: YouJoomla.com
install.description: PLEASE GO TO YOUJOOMLA NEWSFLASH 5.0 MODULE FOR DESCRIPTION

param.name: module_template
param.label: Select default module template
param.description: You can create custom module templates for YJ Newsflash Ultimate Simply copy modules/mod_yj_newsflash5/tmpl/Default folder , rename it to your own template name and edit default.php within your template folder to your liking. Once you have created your module template , your template name will be visible here. You can also copy your template folder to your template/html/mod_yj_newsflash5/ folder and create custom overides for each module instance. To get you started we have created blank module template name New

param.name: yj5_iscopy
param.label: Is this a COPY?
param.description: If this is a copy that should run on same page as original please add one of the following suffixes:_1,_2,_3,_4,_5

param.name: get_items
param.label: News items category
param.description: In this category there must be min 1 news item published

param.name: item
param.label: Select specific items
param.description: Choose specific news items you would like to display

param.name: getspecific
param.label: Specific items list and order
param.description: First select few items from setting above. Drag and drop to re-order items. Click the remove icon to remove an item from the list. Note that the items reorder works only if you set News items ordering to Specific items order!

param.name: ordering
param.label: News Items Ordering
param.description: Choose news items order sequence. Note that Specific items order is the display order of your Specific items order setting above

param.name: nitems
param.label: Number of news items to display
param.description: Number of news items to display

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
